Box of Fun Photobooths

Two-Hour Photo Booth Rental Including Props, Attendant, and Prints

$175
deal over
  • 53%
    savings
  • 29
    purchased
  • -- : -- : --
    remaining
  • share:
  • share11
  • 4
  • email

orWant it for free? Buy first, then share a special link. If three friends buy, yours is free!

  • description
  • fine print

When you were younger, all it took was a cardboard box to create a time machine, race car, or rocket ship. Take inspiration from the past and have a blast at your next bash with today's deal: $150 (regularly $375) for a two-hour photo booth rental package from Box of Fun Photobooths. Open up a world of posed possibilities with the included props, booth attendant, and prints to take home. Serving Macomb, Grosse Pointe, and Oakland Counties, this portable memory-maker will deliver your booth to any location within a 56-mile round trip-radius of the 48312 zipcode to add excitement and entertainment to your next special occasion. Draw the curtain, don goofy glasses and feather boas, and let your imaginations go wild in each frame. You'll leave with a throwback photo strip of smiles -- at an equally old-school price.

• Limit 1 per purchaser, additional as gifts • Limit 1 per event • Recommended to call at least 30 days in advance to schedule • Additional time available at retail rate • $150 deposit waived for LivingSocial vouchers • Wedding events must purchase 2 additional hours at discounted rate of $125.00 per hour • Distance restrictions apply. Service area includes 56-mile round-trip radius of 48312; further distances subject to additional fee • Entire value must be used in a single visit • Other conditions apply

PAID VALUE EXPIRES ON July 8, 2017
PROMOTIONAL VALUE EXPIRES ON June 29, 2013
